#  Splatterhouse 

`BLAS50259.savepatch`

### 1. Max Blood

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010003 C0FFEE00
93000000 00000180
28000000 000F423F
```

### 2. Unlock Classics

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010004 7365315F
0800000D 00000001
80010004 7365325F
0800000D 00000001
80010004 7365335F
0800000D 00000001
```

### 3. All Health Upgrades

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
8001000C 616C7468
55706772 61646532
0800000D 00000001
8001000C 616C7468
55706772 61646531
0800000D 00000001
8001000C 616C7468
55706772 61646533
0800000D 00000001
```

### 4. Max Health Bar

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010008 000001A8
0B00DA19 00000000
2800002C 000F423F
```

### 5. Unlock Classics

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010004 7365315F
0800000D 00000001
80010004 7365335F
0800000D 00000001
80010004 7365325F
0800000D 00000001
```

### 6. Unlock Survival Mode

```
80010004 656E6131
0800000E 00000001

0800000E 00000001
80010004 656E6134
0800000E 00000001
80010004 656E6136
0800000E 00000001
80010004 656E6133
0800000E 00000001
80010004 656E6135
0800000E 00000001
```
